newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexico's TIIE 28-day rate rises to 25.225 pct.
newsitem.headline: Mexico's TIIE 28-day rate rises to 25.225 pct.

text.p: Mexico's 28-day interbank interest rate rose by 32.50 basis points to 25.2250 percent on Wednesday, from 24.90 percent on Tuesday, Banco de Mexico said.
The TIIP fell 3.35 basis points to 25.1836 percent on Wednesday from 25.2171 percent the week before.
The 91-day TIIE meanwhile fell rose 2.50 basis points to 24.5500 percent on Wednesday from 24.5250 percent the week before.
The TIIE is a market-weighted average interbank rate that is replacing the TIIP, an average interbank rate.
